alert.note: Alert for Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 2:27PM MST until January 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Total accumulation 4 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts near the Natrona County line and Linch. * WHERE...Southeast Johnson County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The wintry conditions will impact the evening commute. Roads, especially rural and secondary roads, could become slushy. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected to occur prior to 4 PM, with generally decreasing snowfall after that time.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
